work.summary: Taught  Algebra for two hours a week. Helped students individually on how to approach their in-class assignments. Most students scored above average in their quizzes and exams.
IT assistant at the company helping with software configuration and installation,Network Admin, and Computer Maintenance. currently, in the team to redesign the company's website.

projects.name: Hackernews Web App
projects.summary: Built a Hackernews wep app that let users: search for the news from Hackernews , and view a list of  top news by default. Used ReactJS, HTML, and CSS to build the app. Performed integrational and unit test to elimante bugs in my application.

projects.name: Portfolio Web App
projects.summary: Built my portfoliio web application that shows my various accomplishments. Used JavaScript, react, JSON, HTML, and CSS to build it. Wrote test cases using jest to make my applicaton more robust.

projects.name: Shell
projects.summary: Built a Unix shell that interpreted a set of given command lines. Implemented pipes, redirections, and background that enabled the shell to send the output of oneprogram to another program for further processing. Passed many test cases and resulted into a robust and reliable shell.
